titles.title: Continuing Appropriations and Extensions and Other Matters Act, 2026
Continuing Appropriations and Extensions and Other Matters Act, 2026
A bill making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

vote.text: Under the order of 9/18/2025, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, failed of passage in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 45. Record Vote Number: 527.

action.text: Motion by Senator Schumer to reconsider the vote by which S. 2882 failed of passage (Record Vote No. 527) entered in Senate.
Under the order of 9/19/25, the third reading was vitiated and the bill was read the second time.

calendar.text: Ordered placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 167.
